uno.cards

Class Face_Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • uno.cards.UNO_Card
      • uno.cards.Face_Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<UNO_Card>

    public class Face_Card
extends UNO_Card
    The Face_Card class defines a UNO face card. A face card has a color and a number. Face cards are numbered from 0 to 9.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class uno.cards.UNO_Card

        BLACK, BLUE, GREEN, RED, YELLOW

      Constructs an UNO face card of the given color and with the specified number.

        public int compareTo(UNO_Card other)
        This method allows two face cards to be compared.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<UNO_Card>
        Overrides:
        compareTo in class UNO_Card
        Parameters:
        other - The card to compare with this one. It must be a Face_Card
        Returns:
